level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 purported to make a technical correction in subsec. (a) subsequent to the repeal of this section.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 16-234, the "Green Building Act of 2006", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-515, which was referred to Committee on Consumer and Regulatory Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 14, 2006, and December 5, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-590 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-234 became effective on March 8, 2007.
For history of Law 18-349, see notes under § 10-1001.01.
For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 10-1001.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 10-551.02.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority-Green Building Act of 2006, see Mayor's Order 2007-206, September 21, 2007 (55 DCR 125).
